Messages.messageText: You can choose the hero you want to hire from the drop down list. The cost of each hero is different.

When you decide to hire a hero,the corresponding cost will will deducted from your bank on the top menu. And a hero will appears in your inventory.(The attributes of heros are random within a certain range. )
A toast pops up when you don't have enough lucky coin, and you will no longer be able to click the "Hire" button when the lucky coin is below 100.
You can choose to let the hero go, but you will only get half of your lucky coin back......
